ygData.subject: Re: Time for another Sylly Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Friday night to Saturday morning ... 3a.m., when the campers thin out ... Not sure, becuase the blood from my eyes obstructed my view of the clock ... As
ygData.messageBody:
> When playing your bard in Norrath what is your
> favorite:
>
> Day of the week to play:
>
Friday night to Saturday morning

> Time of day:
>
3a.m., when the campers thin out

> Longest stretch of continuous play:
>
Not sure, becuase the blood from my eyes obstructed my
view of the clock

> Way to have game sounds:
>
As lound as my neigbors can stand them

> Distance to sit from display:
>
Depends on time of day

> TV show to have on:
>
History channel (yeah yeah, bit me)

> Music to listen to:
>
depends on zone, industrial for indoor dungeons where
things get hairy, classical for any of the karana's,
blue's for genral purpose

> Beverage (non-alcoholic):
>
Dew Dew Dew


> Health Food:
>
low fat ice cream?

> Junk Food:
>
High fat ice cream

> Clothes to wear:
>
butt naked or women's underwear (j/k)
BTW, if your woman stands in front of your monitor in
something sexy and asks you to get off the game, don't
ask for time to finish off a hill giant...


=====
